segments.text: My eyes keep returning to that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on reaching those cookies, his body stretched upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool itself looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed outwards, giving it a very precarious tilt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip backward at any second, sending him tumbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just waiting for it to wobble and collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and hitting the hard floor is unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, which would surely shatter if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors just frame his risky endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how absorbed he is, completely unaware of the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems completely unfazed by the potential for a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both so caught up in the cookie acquisition.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
